jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Gojek’s cloud infrastructure is constantly growing to adapt to the limitless amount of new services we provide to millions of people in Indonesia and Southeast Asia. We run thousands of instances spread across our hybrid infrastructure between Datacenter, Google Cloud and Amazon Web Services. 
One of our core focus is to build and operate a platform that can empower our product engineers to the next level. Our platform should be able to assist them in delivering products that can handle massive scale consistently and reliably. Reach us out if you are eager to work with us to operate critical platforms that will be used across Gojek.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Operate, build process and automation on top of our cloud and platforms to empower the engineering team of one of the world’s fastest-growing unicorns
  • Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across distributed teams in a global environment
  • Collaborate with other engineers to ensure services and components are operating reliably
  • Maintain services and overall system health by implementing proper monitoring and symptoms based alerting policies
  • Managing a fully automated build/test/deploy environments
  • Collaborate with the security team to improve the security of our platform
  • Debug production issues across services and levels of the stack
  • Collaborate to work on open source projects

• You think deeply about systems - edge cases, failure modes, behaviors, specific implementations
  • You have a strong understanding of distributed systems
  • You know your way around Linux and the Unix Shell
  • You have strong scripting skills with the preferred language of either Bash, Ruby, Python, or Go and eager to continuously improve your programming skills
  • You are experienced with Infrastructure As Code such as Terraform
  • You have the knowledge of management systems configuration such as Puppet, Chef, Salt, or Ansible
  • You have experience with container technologies: CGroups, Docker, Rocket, or LXC, etc.
  • You have a basic understanding of cluster orchestrators and schedulers (Kubernetes, LXD, or Docker Swarm, etc.)
  • You have experience managing Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, Azure or similar cloud platforms
  • You have experience with monitoring and alerting tools on production
  • You are familiar with Git
  • You believe in the value of documenting so you don't need to learn the same thing twice
  • You have 3+ years of experience in a similar role
